channel.title: crypt_stream.FlushFinalBlock(); -- "The padding is incorrect and cannot be removed."
channel.description:
hello, im using c# and i ran into an error: crypt_stream.FlushFinalBlock(); -- System.Security.Cryptography.CryptographicException: "The padding is incorrect and cannot be removed."
This exception was originally thrown in this call stack:This exception was originally thrown in this call stack: [External code] KeyAuth.encryption.decrypt_string(string, byte[], byte[]) в KeyAuth.cs KeyAuth.encryption.decrypt(string, string, string) в KeyAuth.cs KeyAuth.api.init() в KeyAuth.cs REx_redux.Resources.logins.logins_Load(object, System.EventArgs) в logins.cs [External code]

item.description:
Use the default example with no changes GitHub - KeyAuth/KeyAuth-CSHARP-Example: KeyAuth CSHARP Example

nobody has any issues with it. it is your responsibility to add KeyAuth to your code or vise versa correctly. we only assist with issues with examples that have had no changes to them.

You’ve been blocked from submitting suggestions and bugs on Discord since you spammed them
